title: Did the visitors to Joshua Trey National Park cut trees while the government closed?
subtitle: The symbolic land area was the victim of a shortage of staff due to a budget response in Washington.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Some visitors to Joshua Trey National Park cut trees and committed other acts of vandalism in January 2019, while employees, whose numbers were reduced by the closure of the Federal Government, attempted to control the behaviour of visitors.
